details: Ranbir Kapoor is making a power move to dominate 2026. Heâ€™s reportedly requested Sanjay Leela Bhansali to release 'Love And War' in June. By spacing these blockbusters out, Ranbir aims to break every domestic record in a single year. Bollywood insiders say this gap is vital to maximize hype for both films. Itâ€™s officially the Year of Ranbir!
